RunSynchronousCommand.Path: reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v "SearchboxTaskbarMode" /t REG_SZ /d "reg.exe add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Search /v SearchboxTaskbarMode /t REG_DWORD /d 2 /f" /f
